title: Reporting
body: Can we be allowed to Report people after we leave the score board. People just walk away free.

replies.body: If you get their name from recently played and you've spammed through the scoreboard or whatevs and couldn't report them then submit a support ticket with the Summoner Name, details about what they were doing and an approximate time for the game. You'll usually get a generic, it's being looked into response, but that's because they aren't allowed to tell you the outcome of reports etc, so that's your best bet.
